item.title: 欧洲 4 月汽车销量小幅下滑，特斯拉 49% 的跌幅削弱了电动汽车的涨势
item.description: 特斯拉 4 月份在欧洲的销量比去年同期下降了 49%，尽管电池电动汽车的销量增长了 27.8%，因为这家美国电动汽车制造商对其 Model Y 的升级几乎没有改善该品牌在该地区受损形象的迹象。【原文：Tesla's sales in Europe fell 49% in April from a year earlier, even as battery-electric sales rose by 27.8%, as the U.S. EV maker's upgrade of its Model Y shows little sign of improving the brand's tarnished image in the region.】

item.title: 独家报道中国监管机构传唤汽车制造商讨论 "零里程 "二手车销售问题
item.description: 一位直接了解此事的人士说，中国商务部将与行业机构和包括比亚迪和东风汽车在内的汽车制造商会面，讨论一种新出现的销售从未开过的 "二手车 "的趋势。【原文：China's commerce ministry will meet industry bodies and automakers including BYD and Dongfeng Motor to discuss an emerging trend of sales of "used cars" that were never driven, a person with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 独家报道消息称丰田将把部分 GR Corolla 的生产转移到英国
item.description: 据两位熟知内情的人士透露，丰田计划将其 GR Corolla 跑车的部分生产转移到英国，并将斥资约 5600 万美元在英国建立一条专用生产线，生产出口北美的产品。【原文：Toyota plans to move some production of its GR Corolla sports car to Britain and will spend around $56 million on a dedicated line there to build exports for North America, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后亚洲股市下跌，美元走势艰难
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推迟了对欧盟货物征收 50%关税的威胁后，亚洲股市周二有所回落，但美国期货市场上涨，美元则连续第五个月下跌。【原文：Asian shares eased on Tuesday, though U.S. futures rose after President Donald Trump delayed his threatened 50% duties on European Union shipments, while the dollar was headed for a fifth straight monthly loss.】

item.title: 尽管贸易关系紧张，中国 4 月工业利润仍保持增长势头
item.description: 周二的官方数据显示，中国 4 月份工业利润增速加快，这表明在与美国贸易关系紧张和国内通货紧缩压力挥之不去的情况下，中国经济仍有韧性。【原文：China's industrial profits picked up pace in April, official data showed on Tuesday, signalling economic resilience in the face of trade tensions with the United States and lingering deflationary pressures at home.】

item.title: 中国指责台湾对科技公司实施网络攻击
item.description: 中国广州市公安机关周二发表声明称，一家未具名科技公司遭受的网络攻击是台湾政府所为。【原文：Chinese public security authorities in the city of Guangzhou have attributed a cyberattack on an unnamed technology company to the Taiwan government, a statement showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国税制争论不休，美元走势受阻；日元上涨
item.description: 周二，由于投资者对全面税收和支出法案及其对美国债务状况影响的担忧继续削弱对美国资产的投资情绪，美元艰难地重新站稳了脚跟。【原文：The dollar struggled to regain its footing Tuesday as investor concerns over a sweeping tax and spending bill and its implications for the U.S. debt profile continued to undermine sentiment towards U.S. assets.】

item.title: 欧佩克+产量可能增加，石油价格下跌
item.description: 由于市场参与者权衡了欧佩克+在本周晚些时候的会议上决定进一步增加原油产量的可能性，周二油价有所回落。【原文：Oil prices eased on Tuesday as market participants weighed the possibility of an OPEC+ decision to further increase its crude oil output at a meeting later this week.】

item.title: 日本央行上田呼吁警惕食品通胀风险
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，日本央行必须警惕食品价格上涨可能推高基本通胀率的风险，基本通胀率已经接近2%的目标，这表明日本央行准备继续加息。【原文：The Bank of Japan must be vigilant to the risk rising food prices could push up underlying inflation that is already near its 2% target, Governor Kazuo Ueda said, signaling the central bank's readiness to continue its rate hikes.】

item.title: 英国国际清算银行敦促各国政府遏制债务 "无情 "增长
item.description: 国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）总经理奥古斯丁-卡斯滕斯（Agustin Carstens）周二表示，由于利率上升使一些国家的财政道路难以为继，全球各国政府必须遏制公共债务的 "无情 "增长。【原文：Governments across the globe must curb their "relentless" rise in public debt as higher interest rates make fiscal paths for some countries unsustainable, Agustin Carstens, General Manager of the Bank for International Settlements said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，特朗普媒体将筹集 30 亿美元用于加密货币
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周一援引知情人士的话报道称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的社交媒体公司特朗普媒体与科技集团（Trump Media & Technology Group）计划融资约 30 亿美元，用于比特币等加密货币。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's social media firm, Trump Media & Technology Group , plans to raise about $3 billion to spend on cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin, the Financial Times reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 普京称微软、Zoom 等服务在俄罗斯应受到 "限制
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京周一表示，应 "扼杀 "微软和 Zoom 等有损俄罗斯利益的外国服务提供商。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin said on Monday that foreign service providers like Microsoft and Zoom that act against Russian interests should be "throttled".】

item.title: 缓刑之后，欧盟仍在努力寻找令特朗普满意的贸易协议
item.description: 欧盟可能已经从美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁征收 50%关税的行动中获得了喘息的机会，但欧盟如何将其推动互利贸易协议的努力与华盛顿要求其做出巨大让步的要求相协调，目前仍是个未知数。【原文：The European Union may have won a reprieve from U.S. President Donald Trump's threatened 50% tariffs, but it remains unclear how the bloc will square its push for a mutually beneficial trade deal with Washington's demands for steep concessions.】

item.title: 欧盟从周末与特朗普的通话中看到贸易谈判的 "新动力
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和欧盟首脑乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）周末通电话，为贸易谈判提供了 "新动力"。【原文：A weekend telephone call between U.S. President Donald Trump and EU chief Ursula von der Leyen gave 'new impetus' to trade talks, the EU said, after Trump dropped his threat to impose 50% tariffs on imports from the European Union next month.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁欧盟出口的利害关系
item.description: 2024 年，美国是该贸易集团最大的出口伙伴。【原文：The United States was the trading bloc's biggest export partner in 2024.】

item.title: 香港宽频行政总裁称中国移动出价不够高，欢迎更多竞购者加入
item.description: 中国移动首席执行官周一表示，中国移动以 78 亿港元（约合 9.961 亿美元）收购宽带运营商香港宽带的报价不够理想，这家总部位于香港的公司愿意与更多竞购者接触，为股东争取最佳价值。【原文：China Mobile's HK$7.8 billion ($996.1 million) takeover offer for broadband operator HKBN is not good enough and the Hong Kong-based company is open to engage with more bidders to get the best value for shareholders, its CEO said on Monday.】

item.title: 比亚迪推出以旧换新优惠政策后中国汽车股下挫
item.description: 周一，比亚迪、新奥和吉利等中国汽车制造商股价暴跌，此前行业领头羊比亚迪为 20 多款车型提供了新的优惠政策，长城汽车首席执行官也警告说，全球最大的汽车行业正处于不健康状态。【原文：Shares in Chinese automakers such as BYD, Nio and Geely tumbled on Monday after industry leader BYD offered fresh incentives on over 20 models and the CEO of Great Wall Motors warned that the world's largest auto industry was in an unhealthy state.】

item.title: 车库会议和不眠之夜：新日铁的谈判代表如何受困于美国并购案
item.description: 匹兹堡郊区大雪纷飞，67 岁的日本新日铁公司高管森隆弘（Takahiro Mori）与社区领袖们挤在杂乱的车库里，向他们保证不会放弃收购该镇钢铁厂的竞标。【原文：Snow lay thick in the Pittsburgh suburbs as Takahiro Mori, a bespectacled, 67-year-old executive from Japan's Nippon Steel, huddled in a cluttered garage with community leaders to reassure them he was not giving up on a bid to buy the town's steel mill.】

item.title: 中国餐饮外卖巨头美团第一季度净利润增长 46.2
item.description: 中国领先的餐饮外卖集团美团周一公布，第一季度净利润为109亿元（15.2亿美元），比去年同期的52亿元增长46.2%。【原文：China's leading food delivery group Meituan on Monday reported net profit for the first quarter of 10.9 billion yuan ($1.52 billion), up 46.2% from 5.2 billion yuan in the same period a year ago.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴新 "即时商务 "门户网站日订单量突破 4000 万
item.description: 中国电子商务巨头阿里巴巴周一表示，其在 60 分钟内送达商品的淘宝即时商务门户网站在推出一个月内，日订单量已突破 4000 万。【原文：Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba said Monday that its Taobao Instant Commerce portal, which delivers items within 60 minutes, has surpassed 40 million daily orders within a month of launching.】

item.title: 凯捷和 SAP 与 Mistral 合作，为敏感行业部署人工智能
item.description: 法国 IT 公司凯捷（Capgemini）周一表示，它将与德国 SAP 公司合作，为敏感行业部署定制的 Mistral AI 解决方案。【原文：French IT firm Capgemini said on Monday it was partnering with Germany's SAP to deploy custom Mistral AI solutions for sensitive industries.】

item.title: 全球央行在东京谈论严峻的新经济现实
item.description: 这是日本版的美联储杰克逊霍尔研讨会，没有加息或观点，今年在东京举行的全球央行行长会议将重点讨论两个令人不安的现实问题：经济增长乏力和通胀胶着。【原文：It's Japan's version of the Fed's Jackson Hole symposium, without the trail hikes or views, and this year's gathering of global central bankers in Tokyo will focus on two uncomfortable realities: flagging economic growth and sticky inflation.】

item.title: 亚洲对冲基金五月收复失地，杠杆率上升
item.description: 在大盘上涨的背景下，以亚洲股票为重点的对冲基金在 5 月份上涨，抹去了 4 月份因关税而造成的损失，并回到了今年迄今为止的高点。【原文：Asian equity-focused hedge funds have risen in May, erasing April's tariff-driven losses and returning to year-to-date highs on the back of broad market gains.】

item.title: 特朗普延长欧盟关税期限提振市场情绪，STOXX 600 指数跳涨
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推迟了对欧盟征收 50%关税的威胁，欧洲股市周一大涨，有望收复上一交易日的失地。【原文：European shares surged on Monday, poised to recoup the previous session's losses on relief after U.S. President Donald Trump delayed his threat to impose a 50% tariff on the European Union.】

item.title: 日本准备完善近海风电规则，因为参与者都感到冷淡
item.description: 业内人士称，日本很可能为开发商提供更优惠的条件，以建设大规模的海上风电场，因为日本希望在全球项目因成本飙升和延期而陷入低迷的情况下，使其能源雄心重回正轨。【原文：Japan is likely to sweeten terms for developers to build a massive offshore wind farm sector, industry insiders say, as it looks to put its energy ambitions back on track against a worldwide slump of projects hit by soaring costs and delays.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，花旗任命塔克尔为南亚和东南亚企业银行主管
item.description: 根据一份内部备忘录，花旗集团任命 Prashant Thakker 为南亚和东南亚企业银行主管。【原文：Citigroup has appointed Prashant Thakker head of the corporate bank for South- and Southeast Asia, according to an internal memo.】

item.title: 欧洲 欧洲在 "良好 "通话后反弹
item.description: Vidya Ranganathan 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Vidya Ranganathan.】

item.title: 随着对 ChatGPT 的需求不断增长，OpenAI 将在首尔开设办事处
item.description: OpenAI 周一表示，随着韩国对其 ChatGPT 服务的需求激增，OpenAI 将在首尔设立首个办事处，并已在韩国建立了一个实体。【原文：OpenAI will set up its first office in Seoul and has established an entity in South Korea as demand in the country jumps for its ChatGPT service, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 马克龙访问河内，越南越捷航空公司再订购 20 架空客飞机
item.description: 越南廉价航空公司 VietJet 周一在一份新闻稿中表示，该公司同意向空中客车公司订购 20 架 A330neo 宽体喷气机，法国总统马克龙正在河内会见越南领导人。【原文：Vietnamese budget carrier VietJet on Monday agreed to place a new order with planemaker Airbus for 20 A330neo wide-body jets, the airline said in a press release, as French President Emmanuel Macron was in Hanoi to meet Vietnam's leaders.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国将控制美国钢铁公司作为新日铁交易的一部分
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周日表示，美国将控制美国钢铁公司，作为该公司与日本新日铁公司合作的一部分。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Sunday that the United States will have control over U.S. Steel as part of the company's partnership with Japanese firm Nippon Steel .】
